document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">secrets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">slink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Beside </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">God's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">kept </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">word </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Trillion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">years </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">niggardly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">delight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">stare </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">sweet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">beneath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">compare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Our little secrets slink away
